attributes.action: Article 50 should be invoked only after proposals are agreed on in a referendum.
attributes.background: The people deserve the right to determine whether the proposals as put forth by the government are acceptable before the invocation on the A50. We need the people need to have a well presented document, with the terms clearly written along with the implications presented by an independent body.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/176687
